basics.name: Nick Kaufmann
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Full Stack Engineer with proven experience working with Large Scale Applications using Modern development methods, such as deployment and maintanence of over 200 NodeJS API's using AWS Serverless EKS clusters. Strong expertise in developing NodeJS, ReactJS and/or Vanilla JS based applications.

work.summary: Cloud API Engineer on the Horizon Platform
highlights: Respsonsible for Horizon Platform Team that handled every major cell phone client for insurance claims.
Migrating old JAVA-based API's over to serverless Node/ExpressJS API's onto the AWS Architecture.
Presented and instructed teams with new tools and practices related to the platform.
Build Tools internally for teams to utilize.

work.summary: Engineer responsible for completing multiple requirements for different clients
highlights: Handled taking requirements and turning into deliverables for applications
Built reusable library of compoentns and custom frameworks to reduce time-to-completion of contracts and allow more business to be obtained
Onboarded teams for new tools and frameworks for companies to maintain app after hand-off.

work.summary: Created Commercial Platform for Commercial Businesses to Create their own Applications
highlights: Built out client-side UI and logic for generating responsive Drag/Drop widgets for building custom Interal Commercial Applications
Contributed to initial projects (including first ReactJS UI-Slider Library) that removed all JQuery
Trained staff of non-developers to utilize tools and understand solving problems for clientssuch as Responsive Web Design.
